properties.areaDesc: Waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 2:24PM EST until February 7 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, west winds 20 to 25
kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet expected. For the
Gale Watch, southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt
and seas 7 to 10 feet possible. For the second Small Craft
Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM to 4 PM EST
Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 PM this evening
to noon EST Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday
afternoon through Friday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY
